posts.post_title: For trade or sale--T213 Coupon 2 Leach/Reulbach--both sold
posts.post_content:
Posted By: J Levine
I would prefer to trade for T213s that I need (list is below). All cards include shipping.



Back on the Reulbach has no paper loss. If no trades then will sell for $26. SOLD

[IMG]http://i170.photobucket.com/albums/u266/Wite3/t213reulbach.jpg[/IMG]

Back on Leach is skinned. If no trades will sell for $8. SOLD

[IMG]http://i170.photobucket.com/albums/u266/Wite3/t213leach.jpg[/IMG]



Needed T213s:

1910 T-213 Coupon Type 1 (Coupon (mild) Cigarettes on back) #'s: 17 Doolan and 37 Knabe.

1914 T-213 Coupon Type 2 (20 for 5 cents on back) #'s: 5c Bender (no trees), 28a Devore, 64a Magee

("Phila. Nat."), 71b McQuillian ("Phila. Nat."), 71c McQuillian ("Philadelphia Nat.").

1919 T-213 Coupon Type 3 (16 for 10 cts. on back)#'s:4 Bender(no trees).



Thanks for looking,

Joshua
